body_html:
FWIW a bit update on Bazel side:

We released 0.4.4 that should remove the need for the @%s// trick (to be verified).

The change for removing need from ./configure as a separate step are still in-flight: see https://cr.bazel.build/8218 and its parent, should be in next Bazel release.

Once those change are in the Bazel release, we can update TF configure script to be only an user interface that set the good environment variable and just call bazel fetch //... at the end.

body:
FWIW a bit update on Bazel side:

We released 0.4.4 that should remove the need for the @%s// trick (to be verified).

The change for removing need from ./configure as a separate step are still in-flight: see https://cr.bazel.build/8218 and its parent, should be in next Bazel release.

Once those change are in the Bazel release, we can update TF configure script to be only an user interface that set the good environment variable and just call `bazel fetch //...` at the end.
